MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 31-DEC-2020 00:27.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut affecting the KY1 postcode area of Kirkcaldy. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.23pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived in the local area to investigate the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:54 PM on Wednesday, 30 December 2020.
